propose.from sentence: To incorporate entailment knowledge into abstractive summarization models , we propose in this work an entailment - aware encoder and an entailment - aware decoder .

entailment Reward Augmented Maximum Like.from sentence: Furthermore , we propose an entailment Reward Augmented Maximum Likelihood ( RAML ) training that encourages the decoder of the summarization system to produce summary entailed by the source .

share.from sentence: We share the encoder of the summarization generation system with the entailment recognition system , so that the encoder can grasp both the gist of the source sentence and be aware of entailment relationships .
